column4: hi all, i get this message for my stick  writing operation , "Read only file system " how i can change that ?
what file system is on the "stick"
Fat32
fat32 has no file system permissions so it must be mount permissions remount (man mount) with read/write permissions
sudo mount /dev/sda1 /media/flash -rw , i tried this and it does not work  it still read only :(
the -rw comes before the devices
, it does not work till now the same message even i nuatilus under sudo permissions
show me the output of "mount" in a pastbin please
, http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/45256/
, what do you think ?
they conflict
thats not advisable
, but i don't want to loose the stability of FF 2 and the speed of 3 ?
but in FF 3 alpha8 is in ubuntu repository what about FF 3 beta 1 ?
what about it ?
, FF 3 alpha 8 does not conflict !!! , does the beta version will be in the repository ?
what do you mean, does not conflict ?
, they don't conflict
do what you want. the bottom line is the package replaces the old one
, i want to run them simultaneously  :)
you can't
, thanks :)
